scriptsComments.test: NODE_ENV used in config.js to select Mongodb key
scriptsComments.--test-concurrency=1: avoid simultaneous execution (by default each test file is executed in its own process) since here they share the same database
scriptsComments.testselection: only tests marked with only - do not forget to remove them
scriptsComments.dev: watch: make the server track changes, changes to the application's code will cause the server to restart automatically
scriptsComments.start: cross-env: so that the command also works in Windows
scriptsComments.lint: npm install eslint @eslint/js --save-dev ///// npm install --save-dev @stylistic/eslint-plugin-js //// eslint.config.mjs
